nodes.documentation:
Constructor function

     * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens

     * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

     * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address

     * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf

     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens

     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

     * @param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account

     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:
********
Standard kill() function to recover funds *********
nodes.name: kill

params._value: the max amount they can spend

params._extraData: some extra information to send to the approved contract
params._value: the max amount they can spend
the amount of money to burn
the amount of money to burn

approve(address,uint256).notice: Set allowance for other address      * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Set allowance for other address and notify      * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

burn(uint256).notice: Destroy tokens      * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Destroy tokens from other account      * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

methods.constructor: Constructor function      * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract

kill().notice: ******** Standard kill() function to recover funds *********

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens      * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens from other address      * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` on behalf of `_from`
